title: Annoying little problems
text:
Red Green Blue (RGB)

Classic
Basically what a monitor shows
Hard for humans to use

title: Annoying little problems
text:
Hue Saturation Lightness

Easy for humans
Needs a bit more effort to specify
Just convert to RGB
Colour selector

title: Annoying little problems
text:
